releaseNotes: Release Notes - Apache NiFi MiNiFi C++ - Version 0.7.0

issues.title: MINIFI-CPP should run as a Windows service

Help with cpack cross platform
Fix docker-verify

Roll system component manifest into a top level bundle

file permission issues

agent does not do anything

minifi.sh should wait for restart

Make PublishKafka's Delivery Guarantee backwards compatible

Review UUID implementation thread safety

win_build_vs.bat script has some syntax errors
